name: Forgotten (itch) (Bromelee)
description:
First this game idea come out for the #GoedWare Game Jam

the principal theme is extreme, and these game will have this ideas

- extreme slow

- extreme dark

- extreme infected

- extreme inhospitable

The jam also requires a devlogs, so constantly will upload some advances and upload the alpha or tester executable with his respectible devlog until complete the correct beta exe.

You will be a robot that recently wake up from a shut down, you are disfunctional, are afected by a virus, with no objectives and human control, you have liberty in one way, so you must recover yourself and try to repair you and get out of this abandoned place.

*First alpha tester (movement, some audios, character and area test) --- 06/07/2021

*Second alpha tester (Change Standar Pipeline, Post Processing, Visual Effects, Static Code) --- 06/07/2021
